name: Muhammed Sayees
headline: Focused and driven Software Developer and AI/ML Engineer with 1 year of hands-on experience in AI and Data Science.
bio: I'm Muhammed Sayees, a BCA student at Yenepoya University with a passion for AI, data science, and building scalable solutions. With hands-on experience in machine learning, web development, and automation, I aim to make a meaningful impact in the tech industry through intelligent systems and innovative digital platforms.

achievements: Launched a portfolio website using Next.js
Developed a student complaint registration portal

description: Built automation scripts to streamline data workflows and improve efficiency
Used Git and GitHub for version control and collaboration
Integrated external libraries and tools based on project needs
Worked on real-world development problems in a team environment

certifications: Accenture Data Analytics and Visualization Job Simulation

projects.name: Exquio
projects.description: A cross-platform doctor appointment app with user/admin dashboards, an AI Lab Report Analyzer, and an AI Receptionist chatbot for symptom-based doctor recommendations.

projects.name: Roamio
projects.description: Travel Guide Platform: Connected travelers with local guides for personalized experiences using Next.js and Supabase. Included user auth, booking, real-time chat, ML-based guide matching, and AI-generated travel plans.

projects.name: Campus Portal
projects.description: College Event Booking and Complaint Management System with real-time fest registration, AI-based QR ticketing, ML complaint prioritization, and an AI summarizer for efficient admin response.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio site built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion. Showcases Sayees' work, skills, and includes an embedded AI chatbot powered by Model Context Protocol (MCP).

projects.name: SayeesBot (AI Chatbot)
projects.description: An AI chatbot embedded in personal portfolio. Trained on resume and project data to provide intelligent responses and resume insights using Model Context Protocol (MCP).
